remarks: Isomorphism H of a lattice meet.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Apr-2014.)
statement:
dihmeet.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihmeet.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
dihmeet.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihmeet.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihmeet $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( I ` ( X ./\ Y ) ) = ( ( I ` X ) i^i ( I ` Y ) ) ) $.
